name: Double Trouble (1BitTeam)
description:
Play with 2 characters, the Hero and the Villain, to rescue the princess and defeat a new great enemy.

Controls:

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Walk

Space / Z - Jump

Q / Shift - Change Character

E / X - Action

Devs: 

Bruno Daniel

Raylandson Cesário

Arthur César 

Itamar Bezerra

Made with Godot Engine in 8 days.
